function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Workforce and workplace health and safety protocols not being followed","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission within the organization","Mitigation":"Regular training on safety measures, handwashing, wearing protective equipment, and practicing social distancing","Technologies":"Safety training modules, virtual reality simulations","People":"Employees, contractors, visitors","Owner":"Health and safety department"},{"Description":"Lack of compliance to regulatory and health protection agencies","Impact":"Risk of legal action, fines, and increased COVID-19 transmission","Mitigation":"Regular audits and compliance checks, clear communication of regulations and guidelines","Technologies":"Compliance tracking software, communication platforms","People":"Compliance officers, legal team, management","Owner":"Compliance department"},{"Description":"Unsafe onsite living environment and medical assistance","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and poor health outcomes","Mitigation":"Improvement of onsite living conditions, access to medical assistance, regular health monitoring","Technologies":"Health monitoring apps, telemedicine services","People":"Employees living onsite, medical staff","Owner":"Facilities management"}]}
